name: Blue-Eyes Mecha Dragon
text: If a face-up "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" you control leaves the field: You can Special Summon this card from your Hand or GY. You can only Specail Summon "Blue-Eyes Mecha Dragon" once per turn this way. If this card is used for the Synchro Summon of a Dragon Synchro monster, it can be treated as a level 1. If this card is Summoned by its own effect is sent to the GY: You can add 1 card that states "Blue-Eyes" in its text from your Deck to your Hand.
